name: Pinoru
description:
A First Person FPS featuring Head Hunting Culture of Bidayuh.

Only the brave survive and achieve greatness. Only those who strong will continue to survive to realise their dream. Skulls hanging on the doorsteps, watching against any ill wills attempting to step into the home of greatest warrior.

His clanmans all wiped out in a raging battle. None know what happen nor what will happen but there is only one thing for sure.

The survivor will continue to stay alive, seeking his own truth of this world. In His own Identity.

Even if it defies destiny.

A project for submission for SwkGDC Game Jam 2022. To be showcased in WAK2022.
